studentStories.title: Stories of our
studentStories.description: Every success is a unique story. Meet our graduates who are already studying at leading Turkish universities.

aigerim.name: Aigerim Nurlanova
aigerim.quote: "Thanks to the Edu.turkish team, I was able to get into Istanbul University medical faculty. They helped with document preparation, learning Turkish and exam preparation. Now I'm in my 2nd year and incredibly happy!"

arman.name: Arman Toktarbek
arman.quote: "I always dreamed of becoming an engineer but didn't know where to start. Edu.turkish not only helped with admission but also supported throughout the entire process. Now I'm studying at one of Turkey's best technical universities!"

dinara.name: Dinara Smagulova
dinara.quote: "Admission to Boğaziçi seemed impossible, but the Edu.turkish team proved otherwise. Individual approach, quality preparation and constant support - that's what distinguishes them from other agencies."

parentReviews.title: Parents trust
parentReviews.description: Opinions of parents who chose Edu.turkish for their children's education in Turkey

galina.name: Galina Petrovna
galina.quote: I want to thank the entire Edu.turkish team. They guided us step by step, helped with documents and were always in touch. My daughter enrolled at Istanbul University without stress.

nurzhan.name: Nurzhan Toktarbekov
nurzhan.quote: As a father, I wanted to be confident in the right choice. Edu.turkish provided complete transparency of the process, regularly informed about each stage. My son was admitted to a prestigious university, and this is their merit.

almagul.name: Almagul Smagulova
almagul.quote: Professionalism and humanity - that's what distinguishes Edu.turkish. They understood our worries as parents and did everything possible to make the admission process as comfortable as possible for the whole family.

sergey.name: Sergey Volkov
sergey.quote: We live in Russia, and initially worried about how the preparation would go. Online consultations, personal curators and constant communication - all at the highest level. My son successfully enrolled!

zhanna.name: Zhanna Kusainova
zhanna.quote: My daughter was always an excellent student, but we didn't know where to start with studying abroad. Edu.turkish made a clear plan, helped with language preparation and brought us to the result. Huge gratitude!

rustam.name: Rustam Ibragimov
rustam.quote: The most important thing for me was honesty and reliability. Edu.turkish never gave false promises, always told the truth about chances and opportunities. This inspires trust and respect.
